name: Incandescent 2
description: Incandescent 2 is bigger and better than the original. Take your ship and shoot all the many enemies that will attack you. Features multiple difficulty modes and new enemies to face.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2.0GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB video RAM and at least Shader Model 3.0 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 150 MB available space
